DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize patient Acute ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction may benefit primary angioplasty use drug elute balloon/bare metal stent combination without impair process normal vascular heal endothelial function . The goal study : 1 . To compare 6-month angiographic outcome primary angioplasty use drug elute balloon/bare metal stent combination versus drug elute stent versus bare metal stent . 2 . To compare stent apposition stent endothelialization primary angioplasty use drug elute balloon/bare metal stent versus drug elute stent versus bare metal stent . 3 . To compare coronary endothelial function primary angioplasty use drug elute balloon/bare metal stent versus drug elute stent versus bare metal stent .
DOC.criteria: STEMI within 12 hour onset complaint Candidate primary PCI stentimplantation Successful thrombus aspiration define angiographic sign thrombus site plaque rupture TIMI flow equal 1 Unable give write informed consent Diabetes Type C coronary lesion Previous PCI CABG infarct related vessel Left main stenosis 50 % . Triple vessel disease stenosis 50 % 3 epicardial coronary artery Target vessel reference diameter le 2.5 4.0 mm Target lesion length 25 mm Intolerance aspirin clopidogrel Life expectancy le 12 month Women child bear potential
